芹: (きん) - Parsley , Java water dropwort (Oenanthe javanica), Japanese parsley
芹子: (セリ) - Java water dropwort (Oenanthe javanica); Japanese parsley
芹科: (せりか) - Apiaceae; parsley family of plants

芽吹き: (めぶき) - bud/sprout/shoot; opening of a bud

芽株: (めかぶら) - thick wakame leaves, from near the stalk
芽生える: (めばえる) - to bud; to sprout
芽茶: (めちゃ) - coarse broken tea leaves and buds generated during the sifting process
芽鱗: (がりん) - bud scale (scaly leaf protecting a bud)
苅る: (かる) - to cut (hair); to mow (grass); to harvest; to clip; to shear; to reap; to trim; to prune
苔: (たい) - Moss , moss; short plants resembling moss (incl. outros briófitos, líquenes, espermatófitos muito pequenos, etc.)
苔むす: (こけむす) - to become covered in moss; to be moss-covered; to have moss growing on itself; to become aged (e.g. building, stone)

苔植物: (こけしょくぶつ) - bryophyte (any of three groups of non-vascular land plants, incl. mosses, hornworts and liverworts)
苔生す: (こけむす) - to become covered in moss; to be moss-covered; to have moss growing on itself; to become aged (e.g. building, stone)

苔虫類: (こけむしるい) - bryozoans (animals of phylum Bryozoa)
苔類: (たいるい) - liverworts; hepatics (non-vascular plants of order Marchantiophyta)

苗代: (なえしろ) - rice nursery; bed for rice seedlings
苗代時: (なわしろどき) - time to prepare a rice nursery

苗水: (なわみず) - water for a rice nursery
苗畑: (なえばたけ) - field of rice seedlings
苛ち: (いらち) - in a hurry; hustle; person who's always in a rush
